span.span: The type of the channel to be created.

summary.span: 用于创建双工服务的通道，并将该通道与回调对象相关联。

span.span: Used to create a channel to a duplex service and associate that channel with a callback object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 类创建指定回调对象的服务的通道。Use the class to create a channel to a service that specifies a callback object. 对象包装 对象，后者为 WCF 对象提供连接。The object wraps a object, which provides the connectivity for the WCF object. 您可以使用任一类型连接至双工服务。You can use either type to connect to a duplex service. 有关双工服务的详细信息，请参阅[双工服务](/dotnet/framework/wcf/feature-details/duplex-services)For more information about duplex services, see [Duplex Services](/dotnet/framework/wcf/feature-details/duplex-services). 针对从此类派生的托管 C++ 用户的特别说明：Special note for Managed C++ users deriving from this class: - 将清理代码放入 (On)(Begin)Close（和/或 OnAbort）中，而不是放入析构函数中。Put your cleanup code in (On)(Begin)Close (and/or OnAbort), not in a destructor. - 避免使用析构函数：它们会导致编译器自动生成 Avoid destructors: they cause the compiler to auto-generate - 避免使用非引用成员：它们可能会导致编译器自动生成 Avoid non-reference members: they can cause the compiler to auto-generate - 避免使用终结器；但如果包含一个终结器，则应该禁止显示生成警告并从 (On)(Begin)Close（和/或 OnAbort）调用 和终结器本身，以便模拟自动生成的 行为。Avoid finalizers; but if you include one, you should suppress the build warning and call and the finalizer itself from (On)(Begin)Close (and/or OnAbort) in order to emulate what would have been the auto-generated behavior. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何在双工 WCF 客户端类型的客户端中使用， `SampleDuplexHelloClient` 以传递 具有回调对象的新对象来侦听回调。The following example shows the use in the client of a duplex WCF client type, the `SampleDuplexHelloClient`, to pass a new object with the callback object to listen for callbacks. [!code-csharp[CallbackBehaviorAttribute#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/callbackbehaviorattribute/cs/client.cs#3)] [!code-vb[CallbackBehaviorAttribute#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/callbackbehaviorattribute/vb/client.vb#3)]

summary.span: 返回与传递到构造函数的回调对象相关联的服务的通道。

summary.span: 获取双工通道的基础 实现。

span.span: Gets the underlying implementation for the duplex channel.

value.span: 由 属性强制转换为 IDuplexContextChannel 的内部双工通道。

span.span: The inner duplex channel returned by the property cast to an IDuplexContextChannel.
